Issue.creator: chris.elder
Issue.summary: CouchDB unit tests fail for CouchDB 2.1.1
Issue.description: Index definitions in CouchDB 2.1.1 allow for a Partial Filter Selector in the index definition. When an index definition is returned by CouchDB, it now includes this as part of the JSON response. The unit test needs to verify that the correct field and sort is in the JSON response and ignore the rest of the index definition.
